arts.ttl: Dinamo Zagreb vs Monaco predictions: Hosts to hit back under Bjelica
arts.sum: Dinamo Zagreb suffered a mauling at the hands of Bayern Munich last time out in the Champions League, but Simon Barlow expects a big turnaround when they take on Monaco.
